awards.title: Gouden K
awards.description: 'Vandaag werd een Gouden K uitgereikt aan maker Jasper van Es. Stichting Kunstweek kent jaarlijks tien Gouden K’s toe. Dit jaar hebben bijna vijftig wethouders met kunst en cultuur in hun portefeuilles, inwoners uit hun gemeenten voorgedragen voor een Gouden K. Wethouder Saskia Lammers droeg maker Jasper van Es voor: ‘Jasper is een voorvechter voor creativiteit in Eindhoven en weet onze stad op vele manieren een stuk mooier te maken. Hij biedt daarin veel ruimte voor kunstenaars en zet ook andere vormen van beeldende kunst, zoals graffiti, op de kaart in Eindhoven en de rest van Nederland.’

awards.title: Nominated Eindhoven Cultuurprijs
awards.description: I got nominated for the appreciation price of Cultuur Eindhoven.Thanks everybody who voted! I didn’t win, but appreciate the nomination and positive feedback!

projects.title: UPRIGHT | URBAN ART OPEN CALL
projects.description: For De Heuvel i set up an Open Call for Urban Artists. Each artist gets a change to take over one of the four columns in their shopping mall. And we got 198 applications!! In March we finished the columns with the artists Andre HZS, Nina Valkhoff, Kid Kura and Zena-Rae.

projects.title: Baroem / Erase & Confused @ Kelderman en van Noort
projects.description:
Baroem – Erase & Confuse

A photo series on public intervention tactics to disorient the invader of Ukraine.
Kelderman & van Noort.

Together with Graphic Matters we made a pop up show during the Dutch Design Week with the photographs Baroem took when visiting Ukraine in the beginning of the war. This was the second pop up of his project.

projects.title: We painted the PSV players bus
projects.description:
We painted the PSV players bus
PSV approached me if i wanted to organize painting the players bus when they played their rival Ajax. No supporters were allowed during the match. To still show their support fans could send in their message which we painted on the bus.

projects.title: Baroem – Erase & Confuse at 3.sec gallery
projects.description:
Baroem – Erase & Confuse
At 3.sec Gallery during Breda Photo

A photo series on public intervention tactics to disorient the invader of Ukraine.

February 24 was not only the beginning of the invasion of Ukraine by Russia but also the beginning of an information war. In Russia, the propaganda had started years ago and the first targets in Ukraine were to shut down Ukrainian communications. Hackers from the west also reacted immediately and major Russian media channels such as RT were shut down. But there are also opportunities in the field to mislead the enemy through misinformation and censorship.

The young Dutch photographer Baroem (1997) discovered this when he left the Netherlands for Ukraine in mid-March with a van full of relief supplies. Through a network of graffiti writers, in which Baroem is also active, he ended up in Lviv and Kyiv, where he delivered goods with local guys and fed confused abandoned dogs. Along the way he witnessed removed but also painted over road signs. Brave Ukrainians were urged on social media by Ukravtodor, the State Agency of Motor Roads of Ukraine, and the Ministry of Defense to remove signage and land markings in order to confuse the invading Russian forces. The Russian army is struggling with poor communication and proved to be unable to navigate well without this signage. This resulted in a series of photos of various roller-painted road signs in both the cities and along the highways.

The series can be seen during Breda Photo in the world’s only drive-by gallery, 3sec.gallery in Breda.

From September 8 to October 23, 2022 in the Chassé Parking, so open 24/7.

projects.title: ANTIGOON @BUM galerie Ljubljana
projects.description:
ANTIGOON @BUM galerie Ljubljana
Thanks to my friends of the Ljubljana Street Art Festival i had a chance to show the work of one of Eindhovens most interesting artists in Slovenia!

ANTIGOON – SOLO SHOW
DUM Project Space, Ljubljana / 28 June – 3 July 
Curated by Jasper van Es


Antigoon (Netherlands, 1983) makes machines that apply patterns with markers, spray cans and other materials.The result is inhumanly perfect and geometric. Yet you see the signs of materials that are actually made for humans: dripping paint, pressed crayons and pencilmarks. There is room for imperfection and so the work retains the raw characteristics of graffiti. During the Street Art Festival Antigoon will show different works from his series ‘Mechanical Buffing’ and ‘Ligature’. All works are for sale during opening times.

projects.title: Windows to the World Jam – Black&Yellow, Black&Yellow!
projects.description:
Windows to the World Jam – Black&Yellow, Black&Yellow!
With my platform Windows to the World I organized the Black&Yellow, Black&Yellow, Black&Yellow jam during the Emoves Festival in june. I think each edition it’s important to experimented and challenge ourselves. This time we also challenged the public, giving them the opportunity to join and tag/write their name in the yellow plexiglass kiosk we build with our friend Dion Visser. And all the invited artists where challenged to only work with black, yellow and a little help of white and orange. Great day! More info here. Thanks Emoves and PluginCity for this collab!!

projects.title: Nano Graffiti during STRP Festival
projects.description:
Nano Graffiti during STRP Festival
For the the STRP festival 2022 i initiated, curated and produced the project Mine is smaller than yours by the Slovenian artist that uses the alias Name:

In this project the innovative artist Name: collaborates with other artists and graffiti writers in the creation of the world’s smallest graffiti, using nanotechnology.
In different locations in Eindhoven, related to the Philips history, we placed 10 new nano graffitis. During the STRP festival visitors could see the videos of the nano graffitis in Eindhoven and other places around the world. There is a map so visitors can find the real nano graffitis in public space. Invisible for the naked eye you can only see them when scanning the small QR next to the nanograffiti.

Video in the link

projects.title: Mural by Pablo Allison
projects.description: While i invited Pablo for a talk and release a new print we also managed to paint a nice mural in collaboration with the municipality of Eindhoven. Pablo’s goal in his work is to give attention but also strenght towards the migrants going from middle and north America towards the USA. The words he paints are gathered while he joins the migrants on their journey. Thank you Ruud Jacobs for the opportunity!

projects.title: THE LIGHT OF THE BEAST | Artist talk with Pablo Allison
projects.description:
THE LIGHT OF THE BEAST
Artist talk with Pablo Allison

Curated by Jasper van Es
Thursday 24 March 20:00
KEVN / Galileistraat 2 / Eindhoven NL

Pablo Allison is a photographer and graffiti writer focusing on the Central American migrants who travel on the train towards the United States. He captures their travels with his photography and honors their courage in his graffiti.
Pablo will come to Eindhoven to talk about his work and share his unique experiences. He will also bring some of his publications related to the project.

projects.title: Mural Jeroen Erosie at Chomicha
projects.description: Beginning of 2022 I curated a Mural by Jeroen Erosie in Woensel West on the restaurant Chomicha. End of 2021 they had a fire in the kitchen… so a lot had to be done to fix the place. After the inside we started on the outside. So happy that one of Eindhovens best muralist/post-graffiti artist accepted the challenge and transformed this restaurant of Mo into an iconic place! Give it a visit and enjoy Mo’s great food!

projects.title: Windows to the world short docu about first edition
projects.description:
Short docu about Windows to the World.
In December 2020, me and my friend Ben Plummer organized the first edition of Windows to the World, a signpainting event in Eindhoven. This is Eindhoven asked Blickfänger to make a short docu about Windows to the World and the new generation of sign painters.

This documentary featured: Jasper van Es (founder and organizer of Windows to the World), Ben Plummer (organizer of Windows to the World and The Ben Plummer Sign co.), Guy Verbeek (typographic designer), Niels Bakkerus (lettering & street art artist),and Miranda Ensink (Amsterdam Signpainters).

Thank you This is Eindhoven!

profile_positions.description:
I'm an independent curator, creative producer and expert in the field of Urban Art and Graffiti. Both commissioned as on own initiative I have created several exhibitions, public interventions and installations, workshops, lectures and other cultural events. Mostly in the field of Urban Art and
Public Space.
profile_positions.title: Independent Curator and Creative Producer

company.name: Windows to the World / Sign painting platform

profile_positions.company: Windows to the World / Sign painting platform
profile_positions.description: Windows to the World is a sign painting platform that organized events mainly in Eindhoven. We organized two festivals in the city centre, an expo at Kelderman en van Noort, a jam at Emoves Festival, a fundraiser for a local playground, online challenges and collaborations between poets and signpainters. More info of our last festival on www.windowstotheworld.nl
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: In 2021 we founded UCMASTERS, a new talent development program for artists in the field of urban art, urban dance, urban music and spoken word. I coach the artists in the field of urban art. Supported by OCW, Province Noord Brabant and Gemeente Eindhoven.
profile_positions.title: Coach & Ontwikkelaar UCMASTERS

profile_positions.description:
PAPERJAM is a creative agency based in Eindhoven that focuses on creating and promoting cultural events, exhibitions, art installations. For our portfolio & projects, please check www.wearepaperjam.com.

profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: We called it Party&Bullshit. We did a lot of fun stuff, crazy parties and projects. Google it, or better, ask around ;)
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder en creative producer

profile_positions.description: Ik ben bij MU begonnen als hoofd van educatie en programmeur van het avondprogramma MU & More. Na ongeveer 2 jaar ben ik verder gegaan in de functie van curator en projectleider. In deze vijf jaar hebben we zo’n 30 tentoonstellingen georganiseerd en een flink randprogramma van lezingen, filmvertoningen, installaties en workshops.
profile_positions.title: Curator & projectleider
